txt.en: You have encountered the Warband leader, Zovarr and his squad of soldiers!
Zovarr leads a veteran squad of soldiers on their patrol duties around the White Hand encampments of The Fallows.
Zovarr leads a veteran squad of soldiers on their patrol duties around the White Hand encampments of The Fallows.
Zovarr patrols around the White Hand encampments of The Fallows.
The Fallows farmland is safer now that Zovarr has been taken care of, thanks to you. The people of Forlaw appreciate your efforts.
Zovarr patrols around the White Hand encampments of The Fallows.
